title: Love Island Australia's Vanessa Sierra's $27,000 transformation
text:
Never-before-seen photos of Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra reveal how she has dramatically transformed her appearance prior to the show.

In pictures obtained exclusively by Daily Mail Australia on Saturday, the 24-year-old shows off the results of her $15,000 rhinoplasty surgery.

The brunette, who admits to having a fascination with altering her appearance since age 13, has also undergone a breast enhancement, Botox and fillers.

EXCLUSIVE: 'My fascination with changing myself started at age 13': Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra, 24, showed off her $27,000 surgery makeover in never-before-seen photos

A montage image taken in 2015 sees Vanessa without makeup and her hair tied up into a high ponytail.

Four side-on images, captured from different angles, draw attention to the reality star's pre-surgery nose.

Vanessa said that she 'grew up with a big hump on her nose' and that it 'looked huge in photos'.

Stage one: Vanessa had her first rhinoplasty in 2015 (pictured), and despite being pleased with the results, went back a second time to refine the tip

Stage two: The second surgery increased the total cost to $15,000. Vanessa said she 'grew up with a big hump on her nose' and that it 'looked huge in photos'

Despite being happy with the results, the businesswoman headed back under the knife in 2018 to refine the tip of her nose.

A second montage image from 2018, sees the bridge of Vanessa's nose remarkably slimmer.

The star has also undergone a breast enhancement, increasing her cup size from a 10C to a 10D, setting her back another $10,000.

New nose: The businesswoman's nose is now remarkably slimmer and more defined

Constant tweaking: 'Once I get one thing done, I want to improve something else,' Vanessa admitted. Pictured in a throwback photo with friends

'Once I get one thing done, I want to improve something else,' Vanessa admitted.

Then came three rounds of Botox for a total of $900, followed by cheek, lip, nose and under eye filler at $1100.

Vanessa added that she once posted a 'pretty photo' of herself to Facebook, with trolls calling her 'Penis face'.

More surgery: The star has also undergone a breast enhancement, increasing her cup size from a 10C to a 10D, setting her back another $10,000

The influencer was paired with Matthew Zukowski on the current season of Love Island Australia, but was booted off on Monday night's episode.

Vanessa has made no desire of romancing Matthew on the outside, instead focussing her attention on giving love a chance with eliminated contestant Sam Withers.

Love Island Australia continues Monday at 8.40pm on Channel Nine
description: Never-before-seen photos of Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra reveal how she has dramatically transformed her appearance prior to the show.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
